website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for someone looking to purchase an elevated dog bed that can double as a portable booster seat.
pros: Includes belt loops and a sling to keep your pet buckled in while driving
Boost is high enough to allow your pet window views
Elevated design meant to keep dogs warm in winter and cool in summer
cons: Can feel wobbly in a moving car if not thoroughly tied down

customer_reviews.title: 3 dogs fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 lil pups we needed a car seat for to move across country. The chihuahuas are 4.5 & 9.5 pounds, and our Dauchsy/pug is close to 30 pounds and all 3 fit!!! Might by a 2nd so they can be more comfortable but great product!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan M

customer_reviews.title: Great for a corgi
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. Fits my corgi perfectly. I love it so much. If you have a long dog, but he's small this will be great for you. Plus it has its own carry case to be put away.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our Border Terrier (he is about 17-18 inches long and weighs 35 lbs)... for our upcoming move. Wanted him to be safe and have room to re position when needed. Very pleased with this purchase. Not only does it have the seat belt strap in the back, it also has the adjustable strap to go around the back headrest. Will be buying 2 more for our other dogs which are Dachshunds.
customer_reviews.author: Hughes22

customer_reviews.title: Safety and comfort of dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the Rolls Royce of pet car seats! I added my 24-lb. dog's pet bed to it and she absolutely loves it! It's elevated so she can see every thing. It attaches securely to the car's seatbelts with about the same effort as a child's car seat. Also has a strap that attaches to her collar. It is large though, so only one person can fit in the back seat if you secure it all the way over to one side.
customer_reviews.author: Bgonia

customer_reviews.title: Love this travel bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our long trips we take. I have a Corchi-chi (corgi/chihuahua), he's about 15lbs. He has a travel bed for small dogs but, he can't move and get super comfy in it. I got him the large dog size and it's great! He can stretch out and snuggle in. It is easy to put in and folds up into a bag for storage and carrying. So glad I got this for him. He doesn't care for road trips but, this definitely helps!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs J

customer_reviews.title: Too small for a 50lb. Dog
customer_reviews.text: Our 50 lb golden doodle loved this type of seat in a friend’s car so we bought this one, but it appears too small, or too high for him to enjoy, he doesn’t want to get in it and usually he likes being contained as such in the car. It sits up too close to the ceiling on the stand, and when just the bed is taken out he doesn’t like it so we almost need a stand like 1/4 the size. Please make one!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Neilson

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: My dog (Basenji/Shepherd mix 35 lbs.) was a pain to travel with because he is so nosy. He wanted to be upfront with us so that he could see out the window but he is a little big to be a lap dog and he sheds. This bed allows him to see out the window, sleep with his nose on the ledge of the window and bark it all the cows we pass, which is a treat because we live in the city. He loves it. Very sturdy and secure and folds up to a nice little package when you're not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne D.

customer_reviews.title: durability seems to be good, will advise later only if it is not good
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, includes two tethers, both dogs can fully lie down (they are 7-8lbs each). The box can be secured with the attached adjustable belt to the back seat , or as in this case, fastened sideways to the front passenger seat, letting both dogs have a view out the window, keeping them secured inside the box and not allowing them to distract the driver. It must be comfortable for them as they laid down & fell asleep as if they were home. The box has a 5 inch spacer/filler to support the bed level so that you do not need to fill that to raise the bed higher.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our RV.
customer_reviews.text: Ideal for use in a Mercedes Sprinter RV between the front seats. Dogs love being at a higher level for travel. In our application, we raised it 4” with a piece of upolstery foam under the Booster, which puts the top at seat level. Our 2 small dogs (15 lbs.) sleep while traveling here, and we can reach them easily to pet them. For most any vehicle, this unit will nicely elevate a pet when used on the seats. Our dogs love this Booster.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Great booster seat for 2 small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This is great!! Fits all 3 of my small dogs!! All weighing between 10 to 14 lbs! Total of weight of 36lbs combined! We are going to take a trip to northwestern Tennessee, from southern Florida and we feel really good about this booster seat. And the dogs love to just lay in it as well! Outside of the truck! :) it was easy to assemble took about 30 seconds to put together! Love it! Highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Beckie Bergmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for traveling fur babies
customer_reviews.text: My dog used to be terrified of car rides. This has helped tremendously once I took the time to strap it in properly near the base. It was tough with the full back seat cover I have as there wasn’t a proper hole in my seat cover besides the seatbelt hole which is too low. Now it’s very secure and has helped my dog to feel far more secure in the car. It’s extremely lightweight and extremely strong. It’s also well padded and comfortable. My girl is 43 pounds and has room to spare in this. I have a 2017 CRV and it takes up 2/3 of the back seat.
customer_reviews.author: Denver mommy

customer_reviews.title: Made the trip much easier
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time we traveled with our dog, who hated the car. This bed made it much easier. We stored extra dog food and treats in the base, then popped the bed in, and voila! We used the safety strap for extra security, propped up a travel bowl in the corner, and off we went. The bed is high enough for the dog to see us and out the front windshield, and comfortable enough to sleep in. At the hotel, we popped out the bed from the base, took the bed into the room, and we were set for the night. We are talking about a 2,000-mile road trip. This product made it a much more enjoyable experience.
customer_reviews.author: P. L. Crawford

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would have purchased sooner...
customer_reviews.text: This booster has been a lifesaver! My 35 pound puggle hates car rides and long trips. He gets car sick and drools constantly but not anymore! Now that he's secure in his booster seat and can see out the window, he's much better. He still doesnt love car rides but he doesnt cry to get into the car anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit for the back seat
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. Fits in back of my pickup for 2/3 of the length. Can fit two small dogs easily and includes two tethers to hook to harnesses. My puppy is now 4 months old and a boxer so we only put her in the car seat. Even when full grown she will fit fine. It is nice looking, reversible insert with fur side for winter and plain canvas side for summer. Seat belt threaded easily. Pup loves the height to look out so no struggling to escape. Two pouches on the front face for toys or leashes. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C.S.B.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy
customer_reviews.text: This seat works really well for my Alaskan Klee Kai who has long legs. She can lie down without issue, look out the window and there's enough room for a second small dog. It takes up about 1/2 of my back seat and easily collapses for storage in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Salena G.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and take down, its going in our hall closet for quick access,
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it, we will go for a short ride tomorrow and take more pics. He is a mini Aussie 24 lbs 22 inches from collar to tail, 15 inches from under neck to feet its the perfect size for him. Im glad I picked this brand its very nice and strudy material. The zipper is strong. I believe we will enjoy this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: tracy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Installed this baby in bout 5 minutes and took off for a week with a couple of miniature dachshunds. Size was perfect for them, hight was perfect, and their antics did not exceed the seats sturdiness. Really nice. EXCEPT... Can't imagine why the makers would go to this much trouble to make such a good and affordable seat and then scrimp on the tethers. Monty had them chewed off in no time. So I did have to modify that portion, but I am so impressed with the rest of it that I am still giving it a great review. (Would have pick 4-1/2 stars if I'd had the option.)
customer_reviews.author: Bobbart

customer_reviews.title: I loved the size of this product for my two frenchies ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the size of this product for my two frenchies but I did not feel like it secured enough to the seat in case of an accident or bad stop. It’s not as secure as smaller seats and I think the size of it is why it has this flaw. It also may be because you can’t thread a seatbelt through the middle/bottom part of the pet seat to the other side where it could be buckled in better.
customer_reviews.author: Me!Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two small dogs
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Just what I was looking for. I have two dogs and I wanted both of them to fit in the same carrier. This is perfect for both of them and big enough for them to also lay down. The strap adjusts to lift it so they can see more out the window. It also has a cushion that can be lowered so the dogs are deeper in the carrier. It all folds up and collapses and comes with its own carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: SandraG

customer_reviews.title: Bully pup loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My bulldog loves this bed!!!! its great, it raises her so she can see better out the window. it keeps her secure in the car. can't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat for the pup!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just what I needed for my cavalier/cocker spaniel mix who loves the car but never sits still. I got the large which is a little big for his size but he can easily lie down and be comfortable. The small would’ve been too small for him. Also there is still enough room for one person to sit in the backseat next him. This seat perfectly props him up so he can easily see out the window and still be safely restrained. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My only issue is with my car rather than the booster. Because I have it in the backseat the seat slopes down so the bed booster leans backwards because it's not on a totally flat surface.
customer_reviews.author: would rather read than work

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Ad said two dogs, perfect! My Shiba Inu now 9 months grew into it nicely. I don't need to bend over to far to pick him up. I secure him in with a locking carabiner. He twists out the clip, as expect for his breed. He can stretch out as he frequently does [as a cat] & have safe freedom of movement while I drive. Very easy to set set up. He's been using it for months now.
customer_reviews.author: Engima

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to use with two Shih Tzus(both about 16 lbs). It was easy to install in the car and they both fit comfortably. We are able to clip them in so they don't jump out. It is high enough for them to easily see out of the windows. We have left the elevated part in the car and removed the bed part to use in our RV as a comfy place to sleep under the table. This would work well for a medium sized dog also.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Fan

customer_reviews.title: Not for big dogs as advertized
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality item but it does not work for big dogs. My 45 lb. pit mix fits in the bed well but the clips that are attached to the bed and meant to also attach to her harness to keep her safely in place aren't big enough to clip onto her harness. They don't look big enough to secure a pomeranian let alone a larger dog. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Simonds

customer_reviews.title: Love it and have had no issues with it
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly!!! Love it and have had no issues with it. Used it on a trip from Alabama to Wisconsin and use it at least three times a week. PERFECT for little to medium dogs!!
customer_reviews.author: JN

customer_reviews.title: So happy we got this handy item!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best purchase we have made for our Sheltie dog. My dog is a senior dog who weighs about 21 pounds. Without this item, he would not be as safe in the car. He can sit high enough to see out of the car window, which keeps him interested in the trip. I love the pockets on the side of the seat.
customer_reviews.author: P. M. Boley

customer_reviews.title: Takes up a lot of room
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 2 Yorkies. I like that they can see well from the back seat and has the safety hookup . The only complaint is it doesn’t seem to be to comfortable for them.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Watson

customer_reviews.title: Solved my Poodle Problem!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a bench car seat for the motorhome for three toy poodles. They each ride in an individual doggie car seat in my van but without the headrests in the motorhome, I needed a new system. This fit perfectly on the bench by table (right behind drivers seat, so I can talk to them). It is secured by seat belt and they are secured to it with harnesses. They can see out and feel close to me so they are happy!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I like it !
customer_reviews.text: More importantly, the two 10 lbs. doggies took right to it. Seems well constructed and installed in the rear seat with no problem. Only difficulty were the two swivel snaps for their collars. Too small, and I will replace with larger snaps. Generally, a very good buy !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money spent!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed so we can travel with our two small fur babies. It fit perfectly into the backseat of our truck. Our dogs love it. We also use it as their bed in the RV, and at home. It is made well and sturdy. Best money spent. Will purchase another in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA R CLARK

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I have a Corgi mix (32 lbs), so needed something roomy for 700 mile road trip. He loved being elevated enough to see out the window, as he was unable with our old seat restraint. He was able to freely stretch out, curl up, and sit up. So far it seems sturdy. I ran the cover through the wash after our trip and it suffered no damage.
customer_reviews.author: skr

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Bed
customer_reviews.text: My 2 Pomeranians are perfectly content riding long distances in this bed. It's tall, so they can both see well out windows. It's not hard to "install" really, it's just kind of time consuming with lots of straps and such. Maybe it will get easier the more I do it. Otherwise, it's great. Good colors too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fur baby approved!!
customer_reviews.text: Our Cali loves her booster seat!! Well besides being buckled in lol. It’s comfortable when she just wants to take a nap, she also climbs in it just to play when we bring it in the house, and it sits her up high enough to where she can look out the window and we don’t have to worry about her as much because she is buckled in. I recommend this to any one looking to by a booster seat for there fur baby. We bought the large one. Cali has plenty of room now but not so sure when she gets bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon and Sons Moving

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Pooch
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best purchase I've made for my fur-baby. It is an excellent car seat. She is able to lay down and still see out the car window. When not traveling she uses it as her bed. I put it on an ottoman near the bedroom window so she can watch and sun bathe.
customer_reviews.author: Tess

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Recently my dog (9 yr old 28 lb terrier/x) diagnosed with severe osteoarthritis in both hips. Until recently, when we travel, we had her harnessed safely in the back seat. She loves looking out, sitting all the while we are on the road. This became painful putting pressure on her hips. With this booster seat, it is high enough that she can lie on her tummy, front paws out, still able to look out , now with more comfort, no pressure on her hips.
customer_reviews.author: nancy k. smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazinggg!!!◡̈
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have a bulldog who has bad legs and can’t get her head out the window like she used too and she get car sick so easily and this really helped! At first I thought oh it’s gonna be to tall but it’s the perfect size! It’s just a tad bit hard for me to tighten the straps but other then that it’s amazing! I’ve only had it for two days and I’m in love!! I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Pups can see & Mom isn’t holding them!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for two mini Dachshunds due to their short legs & need to see out the window while going on rides. Box was large when it arrived. Item was intact and all pieces were included. Study feeling material, with a soft foam top to the zip in platform ‘bed’. It appears easy to take apart for cleaning. Dogs have ‘dug’ in bed part (breed specific behavior) and it’s held up with no issues. I take it out of my vehicle and keep it at home as a step-up to my bed when I don’t take the pups with me. Overall money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Rubow

customer_reviews.title: my three dogs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to transport my dogs to work everyday and all three fit comfortably. The car seat is in the middle of my back seat. It only has two thin straps to secure two dogs. But, My dog harness allows me to extend the strap to the backseat head rest so all three doggies are safely secured. The car seat is also high enough for them look out. My dogs are small. I'm happy with the purchase and my doggies are too.
customer_reviews.author: Purplesse

customer_reviews.title: Great view for the pups!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the price. My dog hates car rides but this makes it so much more enjoyable. He loves to see out. It does take up two passenger spaces but for a medium dog to lay down this was the best option. There are different liners and pockets to store stuff in.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: underneath storage, beneficial.
customer_reviews.text: The reversable liner is wonderful. The outside fabric is easy to wipe clean . I am not impressed with the tiny clips that attaches to the dogs harness and the strap is light weight . I replaced mine and love it now.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Berger Homes

customer_reviews.title: My Bulldog loves this bed
customer_reviews.text: I drive a Subaru Outback wagon. The bed does take up half of the back seat but Lexi is comfy and happy in her bed. Bulldogs are short and stocky but she can look out the window and feel the breeze with no issues. Very sturdy and easy to wash and re-assemble when needed (bed, not bull-dog). Have not used the storage pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Marc O.

customer_reviews.title: Great for a Boston terrier couple!
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat overall except straps to hold dogs are flimsy but my dogs are crazy so I use strong seat belt dog straps individually anyway. For the price it’s great! Straps are only 10$ anyway so cheaper then buying a super fancy dog seat for two dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Bunch

customer_reviews.title: luxury ride
customer_reviews.text: We believe our fur baby enjoys riding in this booster seat. Sometimes he lays down other times he watches out the window and we stop for gas he always watches. The seat also has a 2nd line so one can secure 2 fur babies in the seat. This seat is very room, especially for just 1 fur baby. Our boy seen in the picture is at 14 pounds - he has plenty of room.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for a 10 hr drive!
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs (16lb and 11 lb) fit perfectly in this and love it. My smaller dog feels much more comfortable and will even stuck her head out the window now instead of being scared in the car. My other pup prefers to have free roam of the car but absolutely loves to snooze in this. Would absolutely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not the best security strap for dog
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it is a good car seat for my two shihtzus, however, the straps and clips provided are inadequate for anything more than a teacup size dog. I ended up using my strap and clip from my old dog booster.
customer_reviews.author: FrolickingFlorida

customer_reviews.title: Fits all three of my Yorkies
customer_reviews.text: I love this for my dogs but if they weren't little dogs the tether would not be strong enough. It is rather bulky but it installed well in my truck and my dog enjoyed sleeping in it the whole way of our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Love, changed my driving around experience with my pups. Would not ever not have this for them now.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed for my two mid size pups. I love knowing I can hook something to their harness to keep them safe and inside their bed if I needed to break hard. Also keeps them from sliding when turning. Easy to clean and vacuum out from the beach, etc. gave 4 stars on the sturdiness because it could be a little more comfortable but that can be easily fixed with a towel or pad to add for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna Forrest

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy,comfortable, and secure seat for pets
customer_reviews.text: This is a great seat for my two dogs. It’s very sturdy and allows them to sit safely and see out of the window. It is soft and comfortable and has two storage pockets. My only complaint would be that the leashes that connect to my dogs’ harnesses are flimsy, like a ribbon material. I feel they should be thicker, like a regular leash. The hooks are also a little more difficult to undo than a regular leash hook. But it wasn’t enough to deter me from keeping this seat. It was difficult to find a good seat that is large enough for two dogs(21 and 23 lbs.), and this does the job.
customer_reviews.author: christine m erhardt

customer_reviews.title: Great for long car rides and overnight stays in hotels.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a long distance move. My standard sized dachshund was able to see out the window and be comfortable during the long rides. The top zips out so you can use it as a bed in hotel rooms. A great feature. You don’t have to unhook the straps. It has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: TP90CMP

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE it
customer_reviews.text: My Mini aussie (45lbs) fits perfectly with room to spare He loves this thing! Can easily see out the window now! No more motion sickness!
customer_reviews.author: Jane P

customer_reviews.title: A real winner!
customer_reviews.text: I have a large Collie, who loves this sturdy car seat. It holds a heavy dog. Well made. Accommodates my long bodied dog. I could not have found anything better. Well designed. Will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Dog Seat!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this car seat! I have a 12lb yorkiepoo and 7lb yorkie and they have PLENTY of space in this booster chair. It’s exactly what we needed! Highly recommend this dog seat!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this seat for my 55lb 2 year old English Bulldog. He fits perfect with plenty of room sleeping. Super easy to assemble. Cant wait for our next roadtrip!
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeBunnie

customer_reviews.title: Pups give two 🐾
customer_reviews.text: We needed something for our dogs in the car when we go on vacation. This product is easy to set up, made well, sturdy and dogs jumped right in it as soon as I opened it and put together. The bed part is real stiff so definitely want to put soft blanket or something with more cushion down for your pets. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Cox

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for large dogs
customer_reviews.text: I only give it 3 stars because I bought it for our dog who is 73 lbs and it is too tall for her to use comfortably. She reluctantly sits and lays in it but only after a long time of resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Plott

customer_reviews.title: Genius
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is genius! It's collapsible and sturdy. I like how thoughtful it is for summer and winter time. Only downside and I saw this before buying is that the security straps do feel flimsy. They might break later but it could be easily replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia T

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this seller and product
customer_reviews.text: The dog car seat arrived on time. It is exactly what I need for my dog. He is a 27 lb cocker spaniel and can lie in it with room to spare. The props to hold the bed up can be removed if you want your dog to lie lower in the car. The carrying case and bed are well made. I highly recommend this seller and product.
customer_reviews.author: Contessa

customer_reviews.title: A4Pet car seat
customer_reviews.text: The car seat is perfect for my cat to travel in. However, it is large enough for up to a medium sized dog.
customer_reviews.author: The Rescuer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Camping
customer_reviews.text: We use this in RV - boys like to sit in it to look out window when we are parked, but my little one will still sit in my lap. Tried to break it, but he does not like riding in cars. Its durable and folds up small for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Shari C Millican

customer_reviews.title: A happy dog and a happy owner
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this booster car seat because she up high and she can see out the window. I like it because she is secure and the dog hair stays in the booster seat instead of getting on the car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Bock

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two little dogs...
customer_reviews.text: This product is the perfect size for my two dachshunds. The fit snugly in it and let's them see out the window. What this isn't is fit for a Labrador as the picture shows. Clearly photoshopped as it really isn't that big.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppmiester9003

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pet car seat!
customer_reviews.text: My new golden retriever puppy gets Car sick. This keeps her in place & it’s comfy for her to relax on for long or short trips. I bought the large and it came with 2 harness Attachments. lots of room for her to grow too. So glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy had anxiety issue whenever he was in the car, of course the first time he was whimpering a little but he actually fell asleep! And now he just relaxes when we go for rides!
customer_reviews.author: E.C.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality booster seat
customer_reviews.text: Very nice booster car seat with reversible pads. Hooks securely to seat belt and also has hook to attach harness to pet in booster seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is reversible for cool or hot temps.
customer_reviews.text: I like that it is large enough for my two small Dachshunds and it is reversible, for hot and cool temps. My babies love it because they can see out all the windows and can feel the a/c vents. It's large enough for them to lie down while riding too. The price is right compared to other similar items. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: TBone

customer_reviews.title: Bubba loves it
customer_reviews.text: Our pup outgrew his previous car bed. This one is just right for him. Exactly as pictured and described.
customer_reviews.author: mlk

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Spent a half hour trying to get the booster car seat securely fastened in our vehicle. It's impossible. We had a different one previously that was the same size, which we easily could have in the car and didn't move an inch. This new one wobbled around so much, it would be unsafe to have our dog in it. Very disappointed. Will have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Thrilled with this bed!!
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with this item - i have two small dogs - puppies - they can both sleep in it. I think a 30lb dog would be fine with this bed.
customer_reviews.author: melanie1

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much I bought two. My dogs used to hate to ride in the car. One would sit on the floor of the back seat and tremble. Now she curls up and naps between checking out things out the window. The others love it too. It’s foldable, easy to clean, easy to set up and supports two medium size dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Like it so far. The dogs have had a short ride in it already and seemed to be very comfortable, with no desire to get down. Getting ready to drive 15 hours with it. I will update then.
customer_reviews.author: MamaErinBear

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this to keep her dog corralled during a cross country road trip. It did amazingly, keeping the dog secure, safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: It’s large enough for our dog to sleep comfortably. He is 30 pounds
customer_reviews.text: Our dog was afraid of the car but now loves sitting up so high. He’s able to see our all the windows. Not sure how strong the straps that are connected to the seat are. The don’t look strong enough to me.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ludwig

customer_reviews.title: Can't say enough, dog loves it, she took ...
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough, dog loves it, she took to it first time out and she weighs 37 lbs she is a 10 year old cockapoo.
customer_reviews.author: steven ray smith

customer_reviews.title: Good size and height. Fits 2 dogs
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my dachshund and and beagle. They both fit in the seat. Combined with doggie seat belts, it keeps them secure and still lets them enjoy looking out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlei

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. My pupper loves the large one even though she is little. She stretches out on car rides. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this car seat!
customer_reviews.text: She can sit in it and look out the window. She can see out the front and it securely attaches to the back seat so it doesn't slide around. Has a nice hook for her halter so she is kept securely in the bed/seat. She love it and so do we!
customer_reviews.author: CPG

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room for our 4 yorkies
customer_reviews.text: Use it for our side by side offroad Can Am. Easy to secure with seatbelts. Stays put. Our girls can see everything when out on our adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Delania McLean

customer_reviews.title: Super value
customer_reviews.text: This seat is perfect for my two doggies. They can see over dash and watch the road. Very comfortable for them also.
customer_reviews.author: Wynona Mell

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: It’s great except when you need to clean it or reverse the bed. There is a wooden board and a cushion inside which is very difficult to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: large enough for 25 il dog, secure against sudden stops, high enough she can see out, easy to install
customer_reviews.author: james griffin

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a “must” have
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves his booster seat. The booster travels everywhere with us even if we have to rent a car when traveling. Baxter is currently 10 months old and 40 lbs in this picture. Perfect for him to sit and look out the window like a person. Highly recommend especially if you are trying to get your pup to enjoy car rides.
customer_reviews.author: TAMMY

customer_reviews.title: This thing is super cool. Well made
customer_reviews.text: This thing is super cool. Well made, folds back into it's bag pretty easily. And you can use the space in the booster part to stash snacks and stuff.
customer_reviews.author: MotoLady

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Great size for my 2 small dogs. Sturdy and easy to set up. Others have mentioned the tethers are a bit thin. True and clips seem so too. Since I saw that I ordered a separate set. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: H. Heaven

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality!!! My dogs love the view!! Have had this for 2 years and it’s still like new!
customer_reviews.author: Megan McCarron

customer_reviews.title: Our dogs love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what we need to keep our dogs a Safe and comfortable. They enjoy being elevated too.
customer_reviews.author: FLL

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. Our dog now enjoys car rides. He can look out the window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this so badly, but it’s so cheaply made. I wanted to return it but unfortunately I missed the return window. It fell apart so quickly, it’s basically a repurposed suitcase. There’s a folded up piece of plastic on the inside holding my dog up, and surprise, it broke after a week. I’m just super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Large dog car seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice car seat for dogs. Nice fit for my 36 lb dog. She is able to lay comfortably in this a look out the window
customer_reviews.author: Stitches

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for what it is. False floor is weak. Bed sits too high. Not worth the price. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solution to Road Trip Problem
customer_reviews.text: My first thought was really this is going to help my dog sit in the car on road trips... It actually works. She, 3 mth old husky loves it. The only thin I would have like to see add is a water proof tray in case of accidents or spilled food. I would buy product again.
customer_reviews.author: JoanJ

customer_reviews.title: Durable and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Works great and is easy to install and remove. The inside padding only comes up a few inches on the inside walls and so the dog tends to push it down and loses the benefit of padding the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Deano Bravo

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves his booster seat!
customer_reviews.text: My dog and I travel for my job, we love the booster seat, the only down-fall is I had to turn it side-ways because he only sits in the front passenger seat, so I can't secure it to the seat. I would like the option to secure it both ways. Other than that, he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Cheyanne

customer_reviews.title: Made well, really pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Our English Bulldog travels easily in the large seat. Plenty of room for him to lie down. It's make well and works as advertised. I did lots of searching and am confident we made the right choice.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and use.
customer_reviews.text: My dog can stretch out in this car seat and sleep when she gets tired. She loves being able to look out the window. Very pleased with this car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them in place
customer_reviews.text: Not real easy to belt in but work great for the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Bship67

customer_reviews.title: Love this doggie sofa
customer_reviews.text: Love this doggie couch ! Fits both of my pups but if you have 3 small ones they’d probably all fit in there together.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia A. Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Not for Us
customer_reviews.text: Tilted back with the contour of the seat so my 22lb Sheltie struggled to stay put. Built well but just didn't work for us. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: TNgirl53

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Just beautiful! My dog will really appreciate this on our road trips.
customer_reviews.author: plaidheart

customer_reviews.title: Great for a growing puppy
customer_reviews.text: Great for our puppy as he grows and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Love to read

product_meta.title: A4Pet Pet Lookout Booster Car Seat/Raised Pet Bed at Home for 2 Small Dogs, Cats and Large Dog
product_meta.description: A4PET ALL FOR PETS - 15 years of pet products developing and producing experience.- A4PET HAS MASTERED BOTH QUALITY AND FUNCTION.A4Pet Portable Collapsible Large Pet Lookout Booster Car Seat for Design - ELEVATES your pet 6.5" HIGH above the vehicle seat for better view.- EASY TO SET UP and FOLD DOWM FLAT FOR EASY STORAGE when not in use. - TESTED MAX LOAD BEARING WEIGHT 300 lbs.- Used as a DOG BED at home. - Two faced design for warmth in winter and cool in summer, easy to convert it.- SECURITY and STURDY, provides a security leash and two seat belt loops to keep pet restrained for safety while driving. Comfortable Style - Two faced design, two sides are made of cozy fleece and Oxford Fabric respectively, please accord to the air temperature to decide to use which side.- Elevates your pet for better view inside the car, perfect for your pet to enjoy the trip. Safety Info - Pet should not be left unattended on the seat in your car.- When traveling in a car, be sure to secure the seat by the belt only.
feature_bullets: Pet booster car seat for large and medium dog and cat. Dimension: 29" L x 16" W x 14"H; tested Max load bearing weight 300 lbs.
Offer better view for pets: elevates your pet 6. 5 inches high above the vehicle seat. Side storage pocket can keep somethings when travel.
Sturdy and security: included a safety leash, two seat Belt loops and a sling to make it fastness and sturdy on car seat, thereby to keep your pets restrained for safety while driving.
Folable, portable and washable: original structure makes it could be folded down flat for storage. Free carry bag included, Easy to carry, folding size: 19 " L x 6 " W x 15 " H.
Can be also used as a sofa or bed at home. Multifunctional: double-faced design for warmth in winter and cool in summer.
